div.p: The annual variation in hatching date and spring temperatures. ( a) Annual variation in hatching date (hatching day-of-year, solid line) and mean spring temperatures (Feb–Apr, broken line) in the white-throated dipper population in Lyngdalselva, and ( b) the effect of mean spring temperature on annual hatching date in the study area (1978–2011). The trend line in each time series is denoted with a solid line. N = 1045.
